body: Just what the title says. Help?
body_tagged: Just what the title says. Help?
title: How do I add a friend?

replies.body: As of now, you can't add anyone as a friend, though the feature will be added back in the future update.
replies.body_tagged: As of now, you can't add anyone as a friend, though the feature will be added back in the future update.

replies.body: Ok, thank you, hopefully it will be in the winter update.
replies.body_tagged: Ok, thank you, hopefully it will be in the winter update.

replies.body: As stated, at the moment you can't. I'll lock this to prevent further spamming.
